author: geirm
msg: Added the property defaults for runtime log stacktrace squelch.

author: geirm
msg: Added the properties for stacktrace squelch.

author: geirm
msg: - the default properties are always loaded because they are a complete set and
the Velocity engine will run with the defaults.
- any application specified properties via either a file or from a jar will
simply *override* the specific properties.  Any of the default properties that
aren't overridden are still in effect.
- app specified properties are first tried as a file, and then the classpath is
What this means in the end is that when you want to change the configuration of
some aspect of the Vel engine operation, you don't have to specify ALL of the
properties, just the ones you want to change.  The rest will be the default
II. Changed the logging - added properties to switch the stacktrace blather on o
and you can see the default is off.
III.  More logging : the logger will keep individual messages before the logger
is ready to output, rather than just appending them together into a blob.
